form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Blumenthal (for himself and Mr. Cassidy) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to approve interstate commerce carrier apprenticeship programs for purposes of veterans educational assistance, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans’ Transition to Trucking Act of 2025.

section.header: Authorization for Secretary of Veterans Affairs to approve interstate commerce carrier apprenticeship programs for purposes of veterans educational assistance
section.text: Section 3672(c)(1) of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), in the matter before clause (i), by striking The State and inserting Except as provided in subparagraph (B), the State; and
by inserting after subparagraph (A) the following new subparagraph (B):

subparagraph.text: The Secretary may act in the role of a State approving agency for purposes of approval of a multi-State apprenticeship program.
